thread.title: Amazing little hotel! - Review
thread.title_full: Amazing little hotel! - Review of Artus Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Israel N
title: Amazing little hotel! - Review
text: Now our 5th stay at Artus and as awesome as ever. The did such a nice job with the renovation recently as well. The location is perfect, rooms are charming and well appointed, bathrooms are perfect. The service is thoughtful and efficient. Kudos to Sanjay, the chief concierge, for running such a tight ship and remembering guests by name. BRAVO. We will definitely be back again. You won't find higher quality, better location, and more charm anywhere close to this price in the 6th, 7th, or 8th.
